description: This file contains a Spring Boot REST controller with endpoints for welcome, documentation redirect, health check, and application info.

classes.name: HelloController
classes.description: A REST controller providing basic endpoints for the notes backend, including welcome, documentation, health, and info routes.

methods.name: hello
methods.description: Returns a welcome message at the root endpoint '/'

methods.name: docs
methods.description: Redirects to the Swagger UI documentation page at '/swagger-ui.html'

methods.name: health
methods.description: Returns the application health status as 'OK' at '/health'
